system.title: Personal/Group Inventory Management System
system.medium-description: Normal-Form is a system to manage inventory.
system.long-description: Normal-Form is a system to manage inventory. There are many interesting capabilities of such a system. It is modular in the sense that, with certain lending rules, you can stack your instance and friend's instances into a shared inventory, searchable by any of you. It organizing things by an ontology and possibly tags and allows you to search through, possibly in a 3d search space organized by content, and or a webpage.
